reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and flattering, particularly noting how the tie around the waist enhances the midsection and complements various body types. Moreover, the dress receives positive feedback for its fit, quality, and style. However, the material and length receive mixed reviews - while some find the material lovely, others dislike it, and while some appreciate the length, others find it too short. Additionally, opinions about sizing are divided, with some saying it's true to size while others report it runs large. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars No regrets buy the dress
items.body: I rarely write reviews because honestly I gave up on Amazon fashion along time ago because of fit and quality issues, I knew someone who had and couldnâ€™t believe the fit and quality. Iâ€™m 55 years old 5â€™3 and curvy. I wear from a 14 to 18 depending on maker brands. I ordered XL in 5 colors great fabric and fits perfectly and so comfortable and stylish. The wrap at the waist makes me look smaller and hides the extra menopausal pooch. This is a great year around dress. I wish this company would make a v neck version with exterior block pockets and not side interior pockets and would be a perfect addition to buy more. All the colors have been vibrant and true to color. Read more
items.author: mike myers

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and comfy! Perfect!
items.body: I ordered this for a fall wedding. The fit was easy, comfortable and literally perfect. Loved the style, and got a lot of compliments. I wore it with ankle booties and black tights but looks great with strappy sandals as well. The tie waist is super cute. The sizing was spot on and length of dress perfect, I am 5â€™4 ish and it hit just above the knee. Sleeve length good too, as I have long arms and many are too short. These were perfect. Highly recommend this dress! Read more
items.author: Jamie Armbrustmacher

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress, looks nice on.
items.body: This is a cute dress for fall/winter. After reading reviews I sized up to Large. Iâ€™m 5â€™7â€ 153lbs. It fits well, just a little big but the belt tie allows you to cinch it in. Length of dress and the sleeves is perfect for me. Good value for the price. Read more
items.author: Irene Walker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and flattering dress
items.body: After I saw a friend where the dress, I had to order it. Even though Iâ€™m about 10 years older than her, in my 60s, it looks really cute. The fabric is a medium weight knit and fits beautifully. Itâ€™s very flattering. Read more
items.author: Pat K

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute, thin, not soft, makeup stains
items.body: Itâ€™s cute. Rough material. It came with makeup stains on it. Read more
items.author: Jenee Day

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, true to size, quality
items.body: Very comfortable, flattering. Has a good thickness, then for the white, it's not see through. True to size. Needs to be ironed, was very wrinkled straight out of the package. I'm hopeful this will look good for our family photoshoot Read more
items.author: Tiana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little black dress for multiple uses
items.body: Great little black dress. You can tie it in the front or back. I chose the front to help camouflage my stomach a little. Very comfortable. Item did smell a little when taking it out. Smell did go away after a few hours on a hanger though and washed it and hung dry before wearing Read more
items.author: Cree

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely style
items.body: I love the style of this dress. It runs a little small. If you like your clothes very fitted then getting your regular size is fine. I prefer mine on the looser side so I sized up. I would have preferred this dress in a softer fabric. Itâ€™s a little rough for my taste thatâ€™s why I took away one star. I did buy this dress in three colors because I like the style so much. Read more
items.author: Alan H. Rubenstein

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red Brown, Blue, Apricot, Black, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Lake Blue, Navy, Wine Red, Pink, White, Bean Green, Blue Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
